reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Dr. Smith is an excellent professor. His lectures are clear, and he always makes time for students.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Prof. Turner is knowledgeable and engaging, but her exams are quite challenging.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Brown's lectures can be a bit dry, but the lab sessions are well-organized.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Prof. Davis is passionate about her subject and encourages students to think critically.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Dr. Wilson's lectures are difficult to follow, and he rarely responds to emails.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Prof. Johnson is well-organized and provides useful study materials. Her classes are interesting.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Dr. Lee knows his stuff but his teaching style is a bit monotonous.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Prof. Miller is a fantastic professor who truly cares about her students. Highly recommended!

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Dr. White challenges students to think deeply about philosophical issues. His classes are rewarding.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Prof. Thomas is knowledgeable, but her grading can be a bit harsh.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Dr. Martin's lectures are insightful and thought-provoking. He encourages open discussion.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Prof. King is approachable and explains concepts clearly, but the workload is heavy.

reviews.subject: Engineering
reviews.review: Dr. Walker's lectures are disorganized, and he often goes off-topic.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Prof. Scott's passion for art is contagious. Her classes are both informative and enjoyable.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Dr. Harris is knowledgeable, but his lectures can be hard to follow at times.

reviews.subject: Geology
reviews.review: Prof. Edwards makes geology exciting. Her field trips are the highlight of the course.

reviews.subject: Astronomy
reviews.review: Dr. Young is an expert in his field. His enthusiasm for astronomy makes learning fun.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Prof. Martinez's lectures are well-structured and informative, but she can be strict on deadlines.

reviews.subject: Business Administration
reviews.review: Dr. Baker is a good professor, but his assignments can be overwhelming.

reviews.subject: Music
reviews.review: Prof. Clark's passion for music is evident in her teaching. Her classes are a joy to attend.
